review_content: This movie about dreams is mind-bending and brilliant
Batman faces his greatest challenge with the Joker
Space exploration with emotional depth and scientific accuracy
Non-linear storytelling at its finest with great dialogue
Revenge tale with stylized violence and great cinematography
A freed slave's journey to rescue his wife
Hope and friendship in the darkest of places
Supernatural elements in a death row setting
Creatures in the mist create terror and desperation
Dream within a dream concept executed perfectly
Heath Ledger's Joker performance is legendary
Samuel L. Jackson and John Travolta have great chemistry
